attributes.title: Alerts
attributes.description: Provide contextual feedback messages for typical user actions with the handful of available and flexible alert messages.

attributes.title: Badges
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for badges, our small count and labeling component.

attributes.title: Breadcrumb
attributes.description: Indicate the current page's location within a navigational hierarchy that automatically adds separators via CSS.

attributes.title: Button group
attributes.description: Group a series of buttons together on a single line with the button group, and super-power them with JavaScript.

attributes.title: Buttons
attributes.description: Use Bootstrap's custom button styles for actions in forms, dialogs, and more with support for multiple sizes, states, and more.

attributes.title: Cards
attributes.description: Bootstrap's cards provide a flexible and extensible content container with multiple variants and options.

attributes.title: Carousel
attributes.description: A slideshow component for cycling through elements—images or slides of text—like a carousel.

attributes.title: Collapse
attributes.description: Toggle the visibility of content across your project with a few classes and our JavaScript plugins.

attributes.title: Dropdowns
attributes.description: Toggle contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and more with the Bootstrap dropdown plugin.

attributes.title: Forms
attributes.description: Examples and usage guidelines for form control styles, layout options, and custom components for creating a wide variety of forms.

attributes.title: Input group
attributes.description: Easily extend form controls by adding text, buttons, or button groups on either side of textual inputs, custom selects, and custom file inputs.

attributes.title: Jumbotron
attributes.description: Lightweight, flexible component for showcasing hero unit style content.

attributes.title: List group
attributes.description: List groups are a flexible and powerful component for displaying a series of content. Modify and extend them to support just about any content within.

attributes.title: Media object
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for Bootstrap's media object to construct highly repetitive components like blog comments, tweets, and the like.

attributes.title: Modal
attributes.description: Use Bootstrap's JavaScript modal plugin to add dialogs to your site for lightboxes, user notifications, or completely custom content.

attributes.title: Navbar
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for Bootstrap's powerful, responsive navigation header, the navbar. Includes support for branding, navigation, and more, including support for our collapse plugin.

attributes.title: Navs
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for how to use Bootstrap's included navigation components.

attributes.title: Pagination
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for showing pagination to indicate a series of related content exists across multiple pages.

attributes.title: Popovers
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for adding Bootstrap popovers, like those found in iOS, to any element on your site.

attributes.title: Progress
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for using Bootstrap custom progress bars featuring support for stacked bars, animated backgrounds, and text labels.

attributes.title: Scrollspy
attributes.description: Automatically update Bootstrap navigation or list group components based on scroll position to indicate which link is currently active in the viewport.

attributes.title: Spinners
attributes.description: Indicate the loading state of a component or page with Bootstrap spinners, built entirely with HTML, CSS, and no JavaScript.

attributes.title: Toasts
attributes.description: Push notifications to your visitors with a toast, a lightweight and easily customizable alert message.

attributes.title: Tooltips
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for adding custom Bootstrap tooltips with CSS and JavaScript using CSS3 for animations and data-attributes for local title storage.

attributes.title: Code
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for displaying inline and multiline blocks of code with Bootstrap.

attributes.title: Figures
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for displaying related images and text with the figure component in Bootstrap.

attributes.title: Images
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for opting images into responsive behavior (so they never become larger than their parent elements) and add lightweight styles to them—all via classes.

attributes.title: Reboot
attributes.description: Reboot, a collection of element-specific CSS changes in a single file, kickstart Bootstrap to provide an elegant, consistent, and simple baseline to build upon.

attributes.title: Tables
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for opt-in styling of tables (given their prevalent use in JavaScript plugins) with Bootstrap.

attributes.title: Typography
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for Bootstrap typography, including global settings, headings, body text, lists, and more.

attributes.title: Approach
attributes.description: Learn about the guiding principles, strategies, and techniques used to build and maintain Bootstrap so you can more easily customize and extend it yourself.

attributes.title: Icons
attributes.description: Guidance and suggestions for using external icon libraries with Bootstrap.

attributes.title: Grid system
attributes.description: Use our powerful mobile-first flexbox grid to build layouts of all shapes and sizes thanks to a twelve column system, five default responsive tiers, Sass variables and mixins, and dozens of predefined classes.

attributes.title: Overview
attributes.description: Components and options for laying out your Bootstrap project, including wrapping containers, a powerful grid system, a flexible media object, and responsive utility classes.

attributes.title: Utilities for layout
attributes.description: For faster mobile-friendly and responsive development, Bootstrap includes dozens of utility classes for showing, hiding, aligning, and spacing content.

attributes.title: Borders
attributes.description: Use border utilities to quickly style the border and border-radius of an element. Great for images, buttons, or any other element.

attributes.title: Clearfix
attributes.description: Quickly and easily clear floated content within a container by adding a clearfix utility.

attributes.title: Close icon
attributes.description: Use a generic close icon for dismissing content like modals and alerts.

attributes.title: Colors
attributes.description: Convey meaning through color with a handful of color utility classes. Includes support for styling links with hover states, too.

attributes.title: Display property
attributes.description: Quickly and responsively toggle the display value of components and more with our display utilities. Includes support for some of the more common values, as well as some extras for controlling display when printing.

attributes.title: Embeds
attributes.description: Create responsive video or slideshow embeds based on the width of the parent by creating an intrinsic ratio that scales on any device.

attributes.title: Flex
attributes.description: Quickly manage the layout, alignment, and sizing of grid columns, navigation, components, and more with a full suite of responsive flexbox utilities. For more complex implementations, custom CSS may be necessary.

attributes.title: Float
attributes.description: Toggle floats on any element, across any breakpoint, using our responsive float utilities.

attributes.title: Image replacement
attributes.description: Swap text for background images with the image replacement class.

attributes.title: Overflow
attributes.description: Use these shorthand utilities for quickly configuring how content overflows an element.

attributes.title: Position
attributes.description: Use these shorthand utilities for quickly configuring the position of an element.

attributes.title: Screen readers
attributes.description: Use screen reader utilities to hide elements on all devices except screen readers.

attributes.title: Shadows
attributes.description: Add or remove shadows to elements with box-shadow utilities.

attributes.title: Sizing
attributes.description: Easily make an element as wide or as tall with our width and height utilities.

attributes.title: Spacing
attributes.description: Bootstrap includes a wide range of shorthand responsive margin and padding utility classes to modify an element's appearance.

attributes.title: Stretched link
attributes.description: Make any HTML element or Bootstrap component clickable by "stretching" a nested link via CSS.

attributes.title: Text
attributes.description: Documentation and examples for common text utilities to control alignment, wrapping, weight, and more.

attributes.title: Vertical alignment
attributes.description: Easily change the vertical alignment of inline, inline-block, inline-table, and table cell elements.

attributes.title: Visibility
attributes.description: Control the visibility, without modifying the display, of elements with visibility utilities.
